name: OEBF, Open eBook Forum Publication Structure 1.0.1
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://web.archive.org/web/20101212174804/http://idpf.org/oebps/oebps1.0.1/index.htm</field><field name="filenameExtension">opf, xml</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: An XML-based specification for the content, structure, and presentation of electronic books, a predecessor to the EPUB format. OEBPS was developed by the Open eBook Forum, a group of organizations involved in electronic publishing and now known as the International Digital Publishing Forum (IDPF).
